bill.title: ELECTRONIC TRANSFER-TERMINALS
bill.description: Amends the Electronic Fund Transfer Act. Removes the requirement for a person operating a terminal to disclose surcharges for usage of the terminal by a sign on the terminal. Effective immediately.
